snippet.title: Godzilla: Archipelago Shock - Intro
snippet.description:
Godzilla game for the Sega Saturn, released in 1995.

This game is(to my knowledge) the only game to use the Godzilla 1964 Theme, which is easily one of the best songs ever. The game's soundtrack consists of mostly Ifukube songs, with 2 new songs.

Godzilla 1964 Theme(Mothra vs Godzilla Theme) by Akira Ifukube
Godzilla 1954(Main Title) by Akira Ifukube
